website_summaries.verdict: The console table to choose when you desire vintage or traditional style.
pros: A good, elegant style and color combination that will fit well in virtually any room or space
Easy to combine with other furniture pieces
Offers a drawer for extra storage
cons: Some customers had issues with screws not fitting into holes during assembly

website_summaries.verdict: One of the best console tables to choose when you need more storage and organization.
pros: Great built-in storage and organizational possibilities
Three-tier shelving provides plenty of space for a number of items
cons: Somewhat narrower than other console tables available

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not real wood
customer_reviews.text: I got the natural wood color one. It looks great placed in my entry way and looks more expensive than it costs. I put some dark decorative items on each layer to give it some accents and it looks great. However, I assumed it was made of solid wood but it's not. It's pieces of laminate wood. Once assembled, it was slightly wobbly too. I paid $70.00 but I see it's about $50.00. Its worth $50.00 but not $70.00. Check out my pics.
customer_reviews.author: Tarzan

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. The materials/build are similar to an Ikea product, but with much better construction. Someone said it was difficult to put together, but I found it no harder than your average "requires assembly" furniture, and quite honestly, feel it's more stable than most. It also, arrived very quickly and was packaged really well to prevent damage. To note - the "weathered white" is more of a natural color, and less white than you'd imagined. I liked it that way, but keep that in mind if you're looking for something white!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Hallway table
customer_reviews.text: Very unique and perfect for our entrance way! Very sturdy and easy to put together. Reasonably priced and everything was just as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Romei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Now the directions are some what of a challenge, however if you like challenges like myself you will get it eventually. A little tip, wait till the very end to tighten everything. I was able to put it together by myself but it is a heavy piece so some may need assistance with turning it upright.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Ok for its looks but not functional or easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: OK price and two day shipping but VERY HARD to put together, instructions written by a 5 year old (literally--words like 'screw' and 'nail' are extremely misspelled. Not sturdy at all - had to do the entire thing twice. Will keep it only bevause of its height, price, and the inconvenience of dismantling a third time to return.
customer_reviews.author: JacqCastle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but installation is a pain
customer_reviews.text: This product when put together looks exactly as shown in the pictures. Its a great table for its value. My only gripe is the assembly of this table. Due to the nature of the design of the table, there is a limit to how it can be assembled without lowering the quality and sturdiness of it. So i understand and have no qualms. But i have to warn that the assembly of this table will require at least 2 people, or some sort of support in holding up the parts while you are assembling. Besides that, the table works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hong

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: I do not like entertainment centers, none of them are attractive to me. I bought this for the sole reason of getting our TV off of the boxes we moved into our new apartment with. It is not too hard to assemble, however the instructions will have you putting the middle shelf in AFTER the top and bottom are connected....don't do that. It's sturdy and not cheap looking. The bottom middle piece gave me hell, I would suggest using a drill if have one... Overall it's a nice table and for the use of an 'entertainment center' it'll do. However, i will still be mounting my TV and using this cute little table elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Banks

customer_reviews.title: NEED 2 TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: I perused through and read the other reviews and will confirm that the assembly was the most frustating ever... I have assembled myself; a queen size headboard, nightstands, dining room chairs, etc., but none was as difficult as this entry table. I atttempted to do it myself, and after having the first step assembly completely fall apart twice, I gave up. The next day I was able to have my husband help me, and he was also becoming aggravated with the assembly. All in all, after completion, it is very sturdy and truly a beautiful table... Love it!. I decided (upon reading another person's review), not to add the middle shelf.
customer_reviews.author: SSY

customer_reviews.title: Tables looks very nice.  Has stickers to cover visible hole needed for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The finished table looks great. While putting it together, I was concerned it was too wobbly. I was not able to tighten the screws enough by hand. We had to use a power drill. That made a huge difference in the stability. One thing I was disappointed with was that there is a 1.5" hole on the inside of each leg. It is used to put a bracket in and tighten for stability. That makes sense. You get stickers to put over the holes because they are very visible without the stickers. I don't think other people notice as much as I do. Overall happy with the purchase. It dressed up the area.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen R ODell

customer_reviews.title: Stylish modern and great for price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and looks great. One bottom part is just a tad mis-aligned but its on the floor and noone notices. This looks great in my hallway as a small slim accent piece. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Z

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: 100% love this! Bought for my mom for her bedroom! She needed something small and some what slim for her tv and cable box! Thus fits her flat screen perfect and her cable box on the middle shelf great! Highly recommend! Easy to put together! The color was a little darker then I thought but that doesn’t matter it does what we need it to! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shelf. I needed something that was more narrow on the bottom as opposed to the top because of where I was placing it in our house and therefore this is perfect! It’s pretty light and needs to be anchored to the wall. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because the stickers that you apply to cover the screw holes constant bend and come up.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mazing

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble. Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be fairly easy to assemble since it only had a few pieces. Not so. You need 2 people to hold the angled legs. I have assembled 60 inch TV cabinets with less difficulty. Directions are poor. It's still sitting in the box .
customer_reviews.author: shopping junkie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It's not super sturdy, but it's not wobbly either, but if you have young kids I'd stabalize it a bit. Putting it together was a little tricky, and I'm super experienced with self assembly furniture, but after about an hour an a half I got it together, solid and standing. I really like the slanted angles, looks very modern
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Stanislawski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this piece. After moving to a smaller home when my youngest moved away, the downsize was welcome, but you just cant downsize those pictures and collectibles! This fit perfectly into a little space between a curio and a door in my dining room. Its very sturdy and feels well made. The wood grain is a bit exaggerated for my taste, but I only noticed it when I was assembling it. Easy to assemble by myself, no broken pieces. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cyriuslee

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece because it was the perfect look and size for my office wall. I have never struggled with putting furniture together until now. This was the most frustrating thing! The instructions are horrible and I spent over an hour on the first step. That is ridiculous! I am done with this and sending it back. Its just not worth my time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use two people to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Exactly what I imagined. Assembly was a little frustrating because of the design. I assembled it by myself but an extra hand would have made it faster and easier. It’s very sturdy. In the end, it’s a perfect accent to my front foyer. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but hard to put together with only one person. Beautiful item! Placed it at the entry way because it wasn't an overpowering piece and have a short walk through area there. Very nice when all put together.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for my entry area, limited space. The size is perfect, but putting it together was a nightmare! It took 2 of us around 3 hours. After it was put together, it is still not entirely stable. Once put together we noticed that there are white streaks going through each of the 3 shelves. I have attached a photo. After the h___ we went through putting this thing together we are not wanting to return it. Does anyone have any ideas on how this can be repaired? So so disappointed!!! We put it together on carpeting so definitely not something we did wrong. Again these marks are on all 3 of the shelves!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat little table
customer_reviews.text: Stylish table, decent quality for the price. I was able to assemble it fairly quickly, although instructions were not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: A nightmare to put together. I would gladly have paid extra to have it put together and mailed. I am still sitting here with a million pieces
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the struggle
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and size, assembly was very difficult especially screwing in and holding the legs together, but it came out great and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bad quality and ridiculously hard and complicated to Assamble. Super bad quality. Honestly the worst piece of furniture I ever paid for! Waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Great table for my entry
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit and look. I purchased for entry.decorated with 'faux' books and plant. Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Turner

customer_reviews.title: Be Prepared For A Headache
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for assembly are poorly put together & assembling is even worse. It's a nice table in the end but not worth its price tag at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessamichellexo

customer_reviews.title: Elegant table
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stand. I put it together myself, fairly easy. Took about an hour. I did find it was easier for me to put two legs on at one time verses putting all four leggs on as directed by the intructions. Price was right and looks way more expense. I chose not to assemble the middle shelf. Very happy with the out come.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: very difficult to assemble. also very wobbly. a few furniture pads helped with that. overall it looks good, but be careful because it is very hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Study and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Once it’s together it’s great. I have put together numerous pieces of furniture and this by far had the stupidest directions.
customer_reviews.author: Beach lover

customer_reviews.title: Beware takes awhile to put together
customer_reviews.text: They said easy to assemble no it is not! Once I got it together I love it it’s very sturdy nice. The reason why I gave it a one a lot of little pieces. You should really say it’s an involved piece to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Weird design
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute. Putting it together was a nightmare. Maybe with two people it would be better, but such a weird design to be able to keep the legs on while assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Codabug1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks exactly like on the picture
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks exactly like on the picture. I have pretty limited space by the front door so the size is ideal. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. However, you will need A LOT of patience to place the legs on. End result very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Ok shelf, junky / backwards instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine - don't believe the instructions though - they have several pieces labeled backwards. I went against my own intuition and followed the &^%$ instructions and had to disassemble it to fix the direction of the holes and shelf setup. The price is good, its not a horrid piece, but the instructions for assembly are putrid.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moffatt

customer_reviews.title: I love this table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for what I wanted to use it for. I wanted a table to hold the things that I needed to set in a central location in my apartment. Assembly was easy and can be done by one person. It works very well for me. I would recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to get my refund
customer_reviews.text: Wood looks beautiful. The hardware included is very cheap and easily breakable. I managed to fumble this one on step one of the instructions by somehow breaking the camlock. Will return for refund. I think I will just go to the furniture store and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I was looking for a taller one for my apartment and this was amazing. It has a very high end look and looks amazing in my entry way. Although it was really difficult for me to put together. The legs were the hardest for me to figure out then the rest was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It’s everything I expected! But definitely took two people to assemble the leg part, as some of the dowels weren’t as tight as they should’ve been. It’s still sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: TonyaMN

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy stand in comparison to price paid. Matches a set of coffee tables I ordered from Amazon. We use this as a stand for mom in law urn and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lee -Soto

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as an entry table, and it suits that purpose well. Assembly was not as easy as I thought, however, you can assemble it alone. I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, worked out great.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these they are sturdy and heavy. Took a bit to put together though not the best at that. I have them behind my chairs with pictures, my Alexa wireless speakers things like that .Tall enough to see them. So glad i got them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Don’t
customer_reviews.text: Unnecessarily difficult to assemble at first. Didn’t seem to fit right. The holes are suppose are covered by stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Love the cabinet, looks rich and is study. Just missing the stickers that cover the assembly holes. If I had those I would be be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble...very stylish
customer_reviews.text: The nice style and flare...and sturdiness...an amazing piece...just right for that empty space...luv it
customer_reviews.author: proberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks great, fit the small space I have perfectly. It is an inexpensive piece but looks like it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Only concern is the exposed screws at the bottom of the middle shelfs
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition was surprised about how light it was, thought it was gonna be wabbly but once u tighten all the screws properly and tighten the bolts it comes together very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: My entry table
customer_reviews.text: The instructions where not easy to read. It took me more time understating the directions than putting it together. Once I got the legs on (doing it my own way), everything else was easy. Overall, very appealing to my small entry way.
customer_reviews.author: CStamps

customer_reviews.title: Does require assembly and a bit of brain power
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly and it’s not too big and not small it’s perfect The color is very accurate It’s a great sturdy piece
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Slightly different difficult to assemble must read directions
customer_reviews.author: Mary A

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the photo, you would assume simple assembly. Think again!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not gonna last long
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to assemble the directions were a bit off. It’s semi sturdy. For the price tou get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you follow directions carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Using in a guest room, nice piece for the money. Took my husband about an hour to put together with only a few groans.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the ass to put together... ...
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the ass to put together.... so much hardware. Also the color in the picture doesn’t match the color in person very well....
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Good item, put my 42 inch television on it, looks cute in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Good in instructions but a little muscle is needed if ...
customer_reviews.text: Good in instructions but a little muscle is needed if you're putting it together without power tools. Looks great. Great for the end of my hallway!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this piece! It’s perfect for an accent in my hallway!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great looking stand!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand. Easy to assemble and looks great in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose excellent price easy to put together don’t deal
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: a pile of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This item is made of inferior material. you need 8 arms to try to put it together. pieces come out that are made to stay in. this will be put in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Dolinko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice console table! Unique and different! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jetuan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: CAME BROKEN...
customer_reviews.text: The table came broken and very cheap material... and i dont have a time to return it.. just dropping to trash..
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this table
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this table. Yes it took a while to set up but my husband followed the directions and it was fine. There was just a lot of steps which took a while. Also when your drill in the nails use a drill. But it looks amazing and super good quality! The design is sooo different and unique I LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Super cute addition to my home. Easy to assemble ...good quality!!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: Just what my mommy wanted !!! Got it for her as a gift for the house and it looks just fine ! Dark brown did that 😉 hope this was helpful
customer_reviews.author: Noelia P.

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to assemble alignment not great.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to read instructions. Very hard to assemble. Does not look as neat as picture. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lois J. Spellman

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to put together. The instructions and images were off from one another, but once put together it’s really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing find. A little difficult to put together due the angles but totally worth it. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Diviney

customer_reviews.title: Horrible build quality
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately. Item is not sturdy. Assembly instructions and hardware is not good quality. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put together, not sure why I had a hard time. Some spelling was off and unclear but eventually got it! In the end it looks great by our entry way!
customer_reviews.author: Cesario116

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the result
customer_reviews.text: The air was blue during assembly but once it came together, I was happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: MmmNumbers

customer_reviews.title: right between 5 stars and 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Ok...here goes...love the completed piece...a solid 5 stars on that one...when completed, solid as a rock,love the natural color and grain. Now...putting it together...if you don't have a drinking problem before...you will when you're done. I have assembled a sofa, 4 dining room chairs, a recliner, 2 book cases, a tv stand and two bedroom sets...not one took me to tears...(I'm female)...I actually had to stop at one point and wait till the next day to start again. So that part gets no stars , if I could do it.
customer_reviews.author: nancy smith

customer_reviews.title: Pieces look nice but one of the bolts broke and they don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Pieces look nice but one of the bolts broke and they don't give you spares. It's now sitting in pieces in the basement until we can figure out what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap cheap Had 2 parts that needed gluing Color was not the same as it looked in the picture Should have probably sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Mary Otto

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as tv stand in our bedroom. Perfect size. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE YOHO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Looks great. No wobble. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SaraCharlie

customer_reviews.title: More like a podium than an accent piece.
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 tries before the parts were the right color and had the correct “holes” for hardware. Flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once it was finally put together it looks very nice and fits perfectly in the foyer
customer_reviews.text: Once it was finally put together it looks very nice and fits perfectly in the foyer. But it came with missing screws, so I had to improvise and the directions are very difficult to follow. Overall I'd recommend this table but be prepared for some assembly frustrations!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: The espresso may as well be black. Much darker than anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to put together, but absolutely worth it! I get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Yaretzi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table! Very easy to assemble, HOWEVER, be prepared with an extra set of hands - almost impossible to do it by yourself - it took the teamwork of my husband and I to complete the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expected better quality for the price. The top shelf seems hollow. It is laminate.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to put my late father-in-law picture from the funeral service.!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It looks great and was easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Gilgen

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very sturdy & just as described! Instructions aren’t spectacular, but all parts are labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Amann

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Great table and fits perfectly in my entranceway. Sturdy piece but a little hard to put together myself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Console
customer_reviews.text: Nice but a little difficult to put together. Better use your muscles and also had to notify seller that some of the screws were defective and they did send me more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Juliano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty large, but well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gordon

customer_reviews.title: It is a very lovely console BUT putting it together ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very lovely console BUT putting it together is a pain as the instructions are not very clear.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great use as an entrance table
customer_reviews.text: Using the table in my foyer area. I absolutely love it. And the instructions are super easy to follow when putting together. I didnt have to wait for my husband to do this one. And it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trouble and Joy!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't put it together. Original directions very confusing. Had to have 2 parts replaced. Very cooperative seller also sent new directions for assembly. A friend put it together in about 30 min. Looks wonderful - better than photo. Looks as if it cost more money. It's finished all around.. Worth the effort to put together. If you have difficulty, stay with it. You'll love the end result.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked this stand a lot, so I bought 2
customer_reviews.author: Candy Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Screws included are not long enough. Cannot be assembled without correct-sized screws.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, if I had the box, I'd send this one back. The screws do not fit the bottom of the table, not long enough to go through the wood blocks. I hired a gentlemen to assemble this for me and now I will have to go to the hardware store and try to find the correct-sized screws to fit that should have been included with this table. Not happy to fight the traffic for such an unnecessary stop before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, good quality. Faux wood grain is a little exaggerated though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Want to seriously try your patience?
customer_reviews.text: THE worst piece of build-it-yourself furniture EVER! And I’ve built two IKEA kitchens, and numerous other large and small furniture items in the past few years. While I was not expecting much for the price, this was ridiculous! Oddly, though, there was not a scratch or mark on it, and it was well packaged with ALL the parts. (Usually there’s something slightly wrong with these sorts of items.) We finally got it together and it looks pretty good...just terrible build design. Do not buy unless you want to seriously test your patience...and use a lot of four letter words!
customer_reviews.author: Constance C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look like it did in the picture assembly was a breeze
customer_reviews.author: NISMO

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put together and not good looking..... I don't knowwhy I ordered this inthe first place
customer_reviews.author: Alice Sears

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy and great product
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy and great product, the instructions to assemble were a little confusing but after we figured it out, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Bru

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ... But Pretty Tough!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this piece and it looks great in my home. However, there has to be an easier manner in which to assemble this piece. I am VERY handy, but this was a “killer.” I managed to put it together by myself, although I believe it may be best to assemble with an assistant.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and shape of the table. The quality is ok at best. Where you screw the table legs on, the manufacturer gives you stickers (that look like fake wood) to put over the screw holes that are 2 inches wide! The stickers would not stick so I had to super glue them on. Once I did this the table looks much better, but I don't think I should have had to do this with a brand new table.
customer_reviews.author: McMom

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble/
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to assemble the table because one of the leg holes does not have the plastic part for inserting the screw. Tried to call the company, but the voicemail is full
customer_reviews.author: Liccy

customer_reviews.title: Was very pleased with the this table
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the this table . It fit in the area I needed it for just right . Great value for the money !
customer_reviews.author: lauri Demel
